description.value: Each ramiyel has a personal focus. This inclination not only manifests as a talent that grants an extra class skill, but it also affects the ramiyelâ€™s relationship with her environment and other beings. Commonly, a ramiyel is born as what her culture calls a creator, and her extra class skill is a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.bD4kmdFU7wwsenOf]{Profession} skill. Some ramiyels have a nurturer focus, and can choose @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.1tzIBDaDAO4hmX5C]{Diplomacy} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.nBrYkGfNBJAHe0xJ]{Sense Motive} as her extra class skill. A ramiyel who has a huntress focus can choose @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.gZlg2ZKze0erNLmP]{Perception} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.GMkLZsN3a7YPvA03.JournalEntryPage.UDTsEIldhXTn0VJA]{Survival} as her extra class skill.

modifiers.name: Life Instinct
modifiers.notes: Ramiyels have an innate knack for understanding life-forms and their function. They have a +2 species bonus to  Life Science and  Medicine skills.
